
```{r echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
# making the logo
set.seed(155)
data.frame(x = rnorm(100)) %>% 
  mutate(y = 2*x + 10 + rnorm(100, sd = 2)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
    geom_point(color = "#D44420", size = 4) + 
    theme_void() + 
    theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = '#01426A'))
```
